A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An abomination\, an affront to the sense of decency\, disrespectful to the Star Wars legacy. Intellectually incoherent\, gaping with massive plot holes and fruitless sub - plots. An insulting effort to genuine Star Wars fans but perhaps a suitable entry in the catalogue of Soviet Propaganda films. The folks at Disney doused my childhood memories in gasoline\, put a match to all that nostalgia\, and tried to put out the ensuing bonfire by spewing green milk spouting from a space manatee all over it. A colossal failure. \n\nEnd of the line for me and Star Wars.
